revised_title: Transformation Strains and Uniform Fields in Multiphase Elastic Media
tldr: This article explores the effect of local eigenstrain and eigenstress fields on the local strains and stresses in multiphase elastic solids. It introduces transformation influence functions and transformation concentration factor tensors to estimate the residual local fields caused by transformation fields. The self-consistent and Mori-Tanaka methods are used to evaluate specific estimates of these tensors, and the overall stiffness of multiphase media is discussed.
